Scourge:

Scourge smiled. "Update his mind as well, i want a weapon that can think and 
speak as well as any of our people..." He turned and left as the machine arms 
began working. Grimlock looked up. "GrimLock King....."

--part1_142.1262a1ac.2c05bb7c_boundary
